room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
review: We played all the escape rooms in Cleveland and this was definitely our favorite! We played “Death Row”. The puzzles were great, and really forced us to work as a team. We will definitely be returning if we’re ever passing through Cleveland again!

room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
review: Came here with my co-workers for a fun experience and it was so much more than we expected. Our group of 8 did the death row room. It was challenging, but not impossible. Our group needed to get a few clues and escaped with seconds to spare! Mo was easy to work with for scheduling and the room was ready for us as soon as we arrived. Our group size was perfect for this room. So it was the perfect suggestion for us. I'd come again with this group or another of similar size. Definitely a great outing in downtown.

room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
review: We had a great time in the death row room. Will definitely be back! Teamwork and thinking outside of the box is key to getting out. The staff was really helpful and cool.
